banner.title: Revolutionize Your Proxy-Shopping and International Shipping

whatAre.label: What are the answers for the above issues?
whatAre.title: IChiba OnePlatform solutions for proxy-shopping and international shipping service providers

purchase.title: Purchase order management
purchase.content: Empower proxy-shopping businesses to effortlessly oversee and manage the entire lifecycle of purchase orders from multiple sites and vendors within a single, unified dashboard.

auction.title: Auction management
auction.content: Stay ahead of the competition with real-time updates, automated bidding nick distribution, and timely notifications.

pricing.title: Pricing customization for each market
pricing.content: Understanding that each market has its unique dynamics, IChiba OnePlatform enables businesses to craft dual pricing strategies: public and personalized. It allows revenue maximization and customer satisfaction.

international.title: International shipping management
international.content: Designed with the intricacies of cross-border trade in mind, IChiba Cross-Border Forwarding simplifies the shipping process, accommodating various carriers, routes, and regulatory requirements.

items.title: Product crawler (PIM)
items.content: Capture and funnel product data from international e-commerce sites directly to your business website. Ensure your product listings remain up-to-date with the latest pricing, availability, and promotional offers.

items.title: Product finder
items.content: Effortlessly create product collection and make it visible on homepage of your proxy website. Data is collected from international e-commerce sites.

multi.title: Multi-Currency Support
multi.content: Allow transactions in multiple currencies, facilitating international sales.

sercure.title: Secure Payment Gateways
sercure.content: Integrate with trusted payment gateways to ensure secure and reliable transactions.

tax.title: Tax and Duty Calculation
tax.content: Automatically calculate taxes and duties for international shipments to ensure compliance and transparency.

howItWork.label: HOW IT WORKS
howItWork.title: Your Gateway to Simplified Global Commerce
howItWork.content: Streamline your proxy-shopping and international shipping operations in just a few intuitive steps. Here’s how you can leverage our powerful SaaS solution to enhance your business efficiency!

steps.title: Sign up and set up
steps.content: Create your account with us and set up your profile.

steps.title: Product sourcing with real-time crawler
steps.content: Utilize our real-time Product Crawler to effortlessly source products from various international e-commerce sites. Group products to form a collections so buyers can easily find favorite items.

steps.title: Manage purchase orders and auctions
steps.content: Keep track of your orders and bids on IChiba Cross-Border Forwarding dashboard.

steps.title: Pricing customization and personalization
steps.content: Set up your pricing models. Choose between public pricing to stay competitive or personalized pricing for specific customers.

steps.title: Order fulfillment and shipping
steps.content: Once an order is placed, you can oversee every shipment status, from generating shipping labels to calculating the best shipping routes and rates.

streamline.title: Streamline Your Operations and Expand Globally with Ease

items.title: Time and cost efficiency
items.content: Simplify operations, eliminate manual tasks that take a lot of time and resources.

items.title: Scalability
items.content: IChiba SaaS software grows with your business, no matter what scale you are reaching.

items.title: Compliance assistance
items.content: Manage customs, taxes, and international regulations in one place, so businesses do not miss any compliance.
